The half-time of ThX is 4.04828189712487 days. The real value is 3.6 days.

This is the covariant matrix

   0.00101  -0.000106 
 -0.000106    1.8e-05 
The error of lambda is 0.00424690724674443, such that lambda is given as 0.171220087477659 +/- 0.00424690724674443.
This in turn gives a half-life of 4.04828189712487 +/- 0.0171926777257639 days.
Thus, the modern value is not within the uncertainty.
